data.title: PUBLIC LICENSING WORKSHOP UPDATE: Bureau of Cannabis Control Postpones Workshop in Ukiah
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) today announced that its public licensing workshop previously scheduled for Tuesday, February 6 in Ukiah has been postponed.

content.rendered:
The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) today announced that its public licensing workshop previously scheduled for Tuesday, February 6 in Ukiah has been postponed. The Bureau will notify the public when a new date and location is selected for the workshop.

The public licensing workshop on Thursday, February 1 in Oakland is still scheduled to take place at the Oakland Marriott City Center from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m.
